text: Kveldúlfur was an Icelandic trawler company that was established in 1912 by Thor Jensen. Kveldúlfur was one of the largest fishing companies in Iceland until the Second World War, running 7 boats at peak. It made Jensen one of the wealthiest men in Iceland. The company operated from Reykjavík. In 1929 it caught 23,791,000 kilos of fish. After World War II the company declined and eventually operated with just one trawler Kveldúlfur closed in 1977. ==References== Category:Shipping companies of Iceland Category:Food and drink companies established in 1912 Category:1912 establishments in Iceland Category:1977 disestablishments in Iceland Category:Food and drink companies disestablished in 1977 Category:Thors family
title: Kveldúlfur
